config.name: /set afk
config.description: Sets the AFK mentions module for your guild

args.name: enable
args.description: If you want this module to be enabled or not

config.name: /set lewd
config.description: Sets the configuration for NSFW commands in your guild

args.name: enable
args.description: Enables or Disables the NSFW commands

args.name: channel
args.description: Locks these commands into a specific nsfw channel, leave it blank to disable

config.name: /set invite
config.description: Sets the configuration for invite deleter module in your guild

args.name: level
args.description: 0 disables the module, 1 for delete invite, 2 for delete and kick, 3 for delete and ban

args.name: role
args.description: When specified, the module will ignore users that has the role, leave it blank to disable

config.name: /set logs guild
config.description: Sets where the logs for role & nickname sends

args.name: channel
args.description: The actual channel you want to send to, leave it blank to disable

config.name: /set logs member
config.description: Sets where the logs for member leave & join sends

args.name: channel
args.description: The actual channel you want to send to, leave it blank to disable

config.name: /set logs message
config.description: Sets where message edits, deletes and edits sends

args.name: channel
args.description: The actual channel you want to send to, leave it blank to disable

config.name: /set logs moderation
config.description: Sets where the mod-logs (moderation commands info from this bot) sends

args.name: channel
args.description: The actual channel you want to send to, leave it blank to disable

config.name: /set music channel
config.description: Sets where the music commands can only be used

args.name: channel
args.description: The actual channel you want to bind to, leave it blank to disable

config.name: /set music dj
config.description: Sets the DJ role for the music commands

args.name: role
args.description: When specified, DJ role will bind to the specified role, leave it blank to disable

config.name: /set music autoleave
config.description: Sets whether you want to enable or disable 24/7

args.name: enable
args.description: If you want to enable this setting or not

config.name: /set music volume
config.description: Sets the default volume for your player

args.name: level
args.description: Your new default volume (1-200), leave it blank to reset to 100

config.name: /set music voting
config.description: Sets whether to enable / disable voting for skip and stop

args.name: enable
args.description: If you want to enable music skip votes or not. Only works if DJ is set

args.name: count
args.description: If you want to change the minimum count (1-10) for vote, leave it blank to reset to 3

config.name: /set starboard channel
config.description: Sets where the starboard eligable messages will send

args.name: channel
args.description: The actual channel you want, leave it blank to disable

config.name: /set starboard emoji
config.description: Sets a emoji for reacting on messages that the users want on starboard

args.name: emoji
args.description: The actual emoji you want, leave it blank to reset to ⭐

config.name: /set starboard count
config.description: Sets a minimum # of votes for a message to be eligable for starboard

args.name: count
args.description: The minimum reaction count (1-10) you want, leave it blank to reset to 3

config.name: /set suggestion channel
config.description: Sets where the suggestion messages will send

args.name: channel
args.description: The actual channel you want, leave it blank to disable

config.name: /set suggestion emoji
config.description: Sets a custom emoji for suggestion votes

args.name: agree
args.description: The actual emoji you want, leave it blank to reset to ✅

args.name: disagree
args.description: The actual emoji you want, leave it blank to reset to ❎

config.name: /set welcome channel
config.description: Sets where the welcome messages will send

args.name: channel
args.description: The actual channel you want, leave it blank to disable

config.name: /set welcome type
config.description: Sets the type for the message

args.name: type
args.description: Can be either "embed" or "string", leave it blank to reset

config.name: /set welcome message
config.description: Sets the message you want to be shown on member join

args.name: message
args.description: The actual message you want, leave it blank to reset

config.name: /view
config.description: Views your current settings in this guild

developer.name: /dev lavalink routers
developer.description: Shows the current routers the servers use

music.name: /effects nightcore
music.description: Enables the nightcore effect on the player

args.name: speed
args.description: How fast your nightcore playback from (1.0-3.0); Recommended: 1.2-1.5

music.name: /effects 8d
music.description: Enables the 8D audio effect on the player

args.name: strength
args.description: Strength of this panning effect from (0.0-3.0); Recommended: 0.1

music.name: /effects vaporwave
music.description: Enables the vaporwave effect on the player

music.name: /effects karaoke
music.description: Enables the karaoke effect on the player

music.name: /effects clear
music.description: Clears the applied effects in the player

music.name: /effects bassboost off
music.description: Disables the bassboost effect

music.name: /effects bassboost mild
music.description: Sets the bassboost effect to mild

music.name: /effects bassboost normal
music.description: Sets the bassboost effect to normal

music.name: /effects bassboost high
music.description: Sets the bassboost effect to high

music.name: /effects bassboost max
music.description: Sets the bassboost effect to max

music.name: /effects equalizer off
music.description: Disables the equalizer

music.name: /effects equalizer default
music.description: Sets the equalizer to default

music.name: /effects equalizer pop
music.description: Sets the equalizer to pop

music.name: /effects equalizer electronic
music.description: Sets the equalizer to electronic

music.name: /effects equalizer rock
music.description: Sets the equalizer to rock

music.name: /effects equalizer loud
music.description: Sets the equalizer to loud

music.name: /effects equalizer gaming
music.description: Sets the equalizer to gaming

music.name: /listenmoe jpop
music.description: Tunes in to LISTEN.moe (J-pop) station

music.name: /listenmoe kpop
music.description: Tunes in to LISTEN.moe (K-pop) station

music.name: /lyrics
music.description: Gets the lyrics for the currently playing track

music.name: /move
music.description: Moves a song in your queue

args.name: track
args.description: The track to move, can be the track title or the track number

args.name: position
args.description: The new position for this track

music.name: /np
music.description: Shows the currently playing song of the player

music.name: /play
music.description: Plays or enqueues a song

args.name: query
args.description: An url or search term

music.name: /playback auto
music.description: Toggles the autoplay mode of the player

music.name: /playback shuffle
music.description: Shuffles the current queue of the player

music.name: /playback pause
music.description: Pauses the playback of the player

music.name: /playback resume
music.description: Resumes the playback of the player

music.name: /playback seek
music.description: Seeks the playback to the time of your choice

args.name: time
args.description: The time you want to seek to, ex: 30s, 1m 30s, 1h 30m

music.name: /playback repeat off
music.description: Normal playback mode of the player

music.name: /playback repeat one
music.description: Repeats the now playing track of the player

music.name: /playback repeat all
music.description: Repeats all the tracks in queue

music.name: /playlist view
music.description: Views the playlists you have created

music.name: /playlist load
music.description: Loads a playlist you have created into queue

music.name: /playlist save
music.description: Saves the current queue as a new playlist or overwrites an existing playlist

args.name: name
args.description: The name of the playlist to save

music.name: /playlist add
music.description: Adds the currently playing track or a track you specified to a playlist

args.name: name
args.description: The name of the playlist where you want the track to be saved

args.name: track
args.description: If specified, this track will be added to the playlist instead

args.name: top
args.description: If you want the track to be added on top of the playlist tracks

music.name: /playlist remove
music.description: Removes a track in a playlist

args.name: name
args.description: The name of the playlist where you want to remove a track

args.name: track
args.description: The track you want to remove, can be a number or track title

music.name: /playlist delete
music.description: Deletes the existing playlist you specified

args.name: name
args.description: The name of the playlist to delete

music.name: /previous
music.description: Goes back to the most recent track in your queue history (Max 25 tracks)

music.name: /queue
music.description: Shows all the current songs in the queue

music.name: /remove
music.description: Removes a song in your queue

args.name: track
args.description: The track to remove, can be the track title or the track number

music.name: /skip
music.description: Skips the currently playing track

args.name: to
args.description: Skips to the specified song in queue, leave it blank to skip to next song

music.name: /stop
music.description: Stops and destroys the music playback in your guild

music.name: /volume
music.description: Changes the volume for this playback

args.name: scale
args.description: Sets a new volume (1-200) for this playback

suggestion.name: /suggest
suggestion.description: Suggests something! make sure suggestion module is turned on

args.name: suggestion
args.description: The actual thing you want to suggest

suggestion.name: /suggestion list
suggestion.description: Lists the entries on your suggestions

suggestion.name: /suggestion prune
suggestion.description: Prunes the accepted & rejected suggestions from this guild to free up suggestion slots

suggestion.name: /suggestion get
suggestion.description: Gets a specific suggestion from your suggestions

args.name: identifier
args.description: The identifier for the suggestion you want to view

suggestion.name: /suggestion delete
suggestion.description: Force deletes a suggestion regardless of status

args.name: identifier
args.description: The identifier for the suggestion you want to view

args.name: identifier
args.description: The identifier for this suggestion

args.name: reason
args.description: The reason for approving this suggestion

args.name: identifier
args.description: The identifier for this suggestion

args.name: reason
args.description: The reason for rejecting this suggestion

args.name: identifier
args.description: The identifier for this suggestion

args.name: reason
args.description: The reason for considering this suggestion
